name: Chelsea Piers Skatepark
description: Indoor/covered skatepark at Chelsea Piers sports complex along the Hudson River.
history: Part of the Chelsea Piers redevelopment. Provides a sheltered option for rainy days.
bestTimes: Check hours — varies seasonally. Less crowded on weekday mornings.
transitDirections: C/E to 23rd St, walk west to the piers.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include mini ramp, quarter pipes, rails, ledges. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Chelsea. Part of the Chelsea Piers redevelopment. Provides a sheltered option for rainy days.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: C/E to 23rd St, walk west to the piers.. Check hours — varies seasonally. Less crowded on weekday mornings.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
